alert.note: Alert for Scurry (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 10 at 9:34PM CDT until May 10 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR SCURRY COUNTY... At 933 PM CDT, a strong thunderstorm capable of producing damaging winds was located near Snyder, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...The West Texas Mesonet 3 miles east of Snyder reported a 62 mph wind gust. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Snyder, Fluvanna, Inadale, J B Thomas Reservoir, Dunn, Hermleigh, Randalls Corner, Ira, Winston Field and Knapp. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Midland.
